Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class EventProjectController

This controller is created based on the EventProject and EventProjectViewModel classes It allows the creation of projects as well as the listing, editing and deleting of projects It also enables the creation of schedules of each project using partial views And the addition of presentations, documents, 3D models, and event reports as tab views

Inheritance
System.Object
EventProjectController
Namespace: WorkflowManagementSystem.Controllers
Assembly: WorkflowManagementSystem.dll
Syntax
public class EventProjectController : Controller
